name: A Trip To Hexagon Lake
description:
Click or press any key (other than o, h, and p) to push all floating objects away from the mouse. Use this to move the ball into as many fish as you can! 

Tips:

- You can press multiple keys for the boost, try spamming with multiple fingers

- If your fingers get tired, press h and hold down a key instead

- Experiment with funky colors, using P to change the palette, and O to enable rainbow mode!

- Chill out to the music in this simple and relaxing game!

- Nothing can stop them, you will perish eventually

My highscore: 255

Made in 2 days for Mini Jam 93. My goal for this project was to learn how to use post-processing, and make a game feel even juicier.
